content:
Still really sick but I had a great afternoon. Everyone just hanging out together in the lounge. Ava working hard for her driver's license. Even Cas came in and chose to sleep on Jeremy's bed. 
Made a berry and chai compote. Pretty good. 
Spent some time just chilling with no devices or other entertainment. Just peace and quiet. So relaxing. 
Found another bug in my smart sessions at work though. That imposter syndrome is creeping back in. Still working on that one
